description: A very happy meal with heaps of flavour! The pork was beautifully tender and it was a markdown!
name: Pistachio and Lemon Crusted Pork Scotch for 1 Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 tbs butter (or other sauteing medium for pork)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix chopped pistachios, panko crumbs, chill flakes (if using), olive oil and lemon juice in a small bowl and set aside.

Heat to medium butter or other saut√©ing medium in a small frypan and add pork scotch fillet. Cook both sides until done to your preference. The time depends on the thickness of the fillet, I found 3 minutes each side was fine. Set aside to rest.

Add additional butter to the pan and add sliced onions and pinch of sugar. Cook until soft and lightly caramelised. You can mash the potato with salt and pepper, yoghurt (or milk) while the onion is cooking.
Turn on grill. Press crumb mix on top of the pork fillet and toast until the crumb crisps and browns. Watch carefully as the crumb mix has a high fat content and will only take a few seconds.
